name: method of loci
description:
SOME BITS

------------------------

A (semi) interactive installation from 2018 to explore the physical manifestation of my mind over a period of two years. There are 5 scenes to peruse (as you can see in the screenshots), three of which contain a piece of art that I left unfinished over the course of a 2 year period of sleep and absence from my body.

"Method of loci" is a memory technique where one stores memories in an imagined physical space. Here is my initial representation of that space.

Those who live in glasses houses should not throw stones.

CONTROLS:

------------------------

W = forward
S = backward
A = strafe left
D = strafe right
Q = move up

E = move down

Space = move to next scene

Mouse around at your leisure.
